TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
Can't you guys at least be productive with your weaponry and post pics of supersoakers, water balloon catapults, and modded nerfguns?

After a while everyone defaulting to nukes gets silly.

Can't you guys at least be productive with your weaponry and post pics of supersoakers, water balloon catapults, and modded nerfguns?

After a while everyone defaulting to nukes gets silly.

Exactly. *eyes Leon from across the ever-growing gap in the planet*

I think there's too few ponies to made this thread complete.

There you go...
Don't that can get us all killed!
By who and how?
Science. I don't know...

At least I'm now on the half of the planet that doesn't have those.

*looks around at the burning hellscape*

...Leon, why did you aim the Tsar bombas so that you got the good half of the planet?
Oh sorry, *Aims Tsar Bombas at Rage's side of the planet.*

*sits down on charred tree stump next to a river of molten metal.*

...

*sobs*

Suffer at the hands of this German weapon of mass soakification!

Yes, that is a water pistol attached to a garden host.

Yes, it won't run out of ammunition any time soon.

Yes, it will make you wet.

Fine then. *Uses time warp device stolen from Jeb* I just need to reverse this. *Reverses time warp device* *Activates time warp device to before the tsar bombas fell*

Now what?

No! NO!! NOOOOO!!!! IT BURNS!!!!!!

Suffer at the hands of this German weapon of mass soakification!

Yes, that is a water pistol attached to a garden host.

Yes, it won't run out of ammunition any time soon.

Yes, it will make you wet.

*Sticks both hands in the air*

I surrender!
Enough. *Fires Death Star Laser*

*Melts into a puddle with eyes and mouth*

At least I can still speak
I can survive lasers. But water? No way jose.

Enough. *Fires Death Star Laser*

Bah, you people and your mere "planetary" scales of destruction.

Meanwhile, I'm taking a page from "Doc" Smith's Skylark series. Quoting here, under the Literature folder:

By the final novel in the sequence, our heroes destroy two entire galaxies by teleporting every star from one into the close vicinity of every star in the other, causing each pair to collide and go nova, meanwhile teleporting every non-hostile world in the area to safe orbits around stars in a third galaxy, all while they themselves are safe in yet another galaxy entirely...!

Bah, you people and your mere "planetary" scales of destruction.

Meanwhile, I'm taking a page from "Doc" Smith's Skylark series. Quoting here, under the Literature folder:

0___0

I surrender!!!

So it takes galactic destruction to force Jedi to surrender, while a squirt gun will be the death of me.

Well, Then.

Who want this one ?

I think that this fan "plushies" made hasbro toys (founder of franchise) look just plain cheap.

Who want this one ?

I think that this fan "plushies" made hasbro toys (founder of franchise) look just plain cheap.

No! *does this to that*
OK, I have to know where that GIF comes from.

No! *does this to that*

OK, I am not a brony, but that is just plain being cold hearted.

OK, I have to know where that GIF comes from.

http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110316183956/uncyclopedia/images/3/3e/LeeWall_Destroy.gif

With a complimentary dancing cat.

Karolus10, don't those belong in the MLP megathread?

I miss building water balloon trebuchets though. Getting shelled by bucketfulls of balloons from a quarter mile away? Epic fun.

When I was investigating (my colleagues watched this stuff and didn't know WTF it is, that mature people watch this show) the franchise and I realize that whole show are just for promotion of some mediocre (even for little girl) toys... but yeah ponies had they own place .

Karolus10, don't those belong in the MLP megathread?

I know, just teasing you guys for ultimate off-topic .

Edited May 30, 2013 by karolus10
